articles.author: Demetri Sevastopulo
articles.title: China accuses US of seeking 'Asia-Pacific Nato' - Financial Times
articles.description: PLA general blames Washington for tension as Pentagon chief says allies seek ‘convergence’ on defence and security
articles.content: A top Chinese general has accused the US of trying to build an Asia-Pacific version of Nato, underlining tensions between Washington and Beijing one day after the two countries defence chiefs met for… [+4833 chars]
